description: I liked this book a lot because it took me back to the hard moments of the war.
I've been serving my country as lieutenant during the Vietnam war and Connelly made the tears come to my eyes with this writing...
Nothing to say... everyone must read this book!
I don't why I read a book called Educated since I didn't attend any school...
I thought this book could help me develop knowledge in a new type of timber. I was wrong... totally misleading title! Beware men of the forest like me :(
I read the book in just one day. Such a deep and touching story!
I appreciate my name has been used for this book and the story had been thrilling me a lot!
